description: Returns information about the possible endpoint settings available when you create an endpoint for a specific database engine.

parameters.name: EngineName
parameters.description: The database engine used for your source or target endpoint.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

nested_items.name: EndpointSettings
nested_items.description: Descriptions of the endpoint settings available for your source or target database engine.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name that you want to give the endpoint settings.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of endpoint. Valid values are source and target.

nested_items.name: EnumValues
nested_items.description: Enumerated values to use for this endpoint.

nested_items.name: Sensitive
nested_items.description: A value that marks this endpoint setting as sensitive.

nested_items.name: Units
nested_items.description: The unit of measure for this endpoint setting.

nested_items.name: Applicability
nested_items.description: The relevance or validity of an endpoint setting for an engine name and its endpoint type.

nested_items.name: IntValueMin
nested_items.description: The minimum value of an endpoint setting that is of type int.

nested_items.name: IntValueMax
nested_items.description: The maximum value of an endpoint setting that is of type int.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value of the endpoint setting if no value is specified using CreateEndpoint or ModifyEndpoint.
